title: Prepare Mid-Semester Exam Schedule
description: Create and finalize the examination timetable for all departments and courses

title: Update Student Portal
description: Implement new features and fix reported bugs in the student information system

title: Faculty Performance Review
description: Conduct annual performance evaluations for all teaching staff

title: Library Book Inventory
description: Complete annual inventory of library resources and update catalog system

title: Campus Security Audit
description: Review and improve campus security measures and protocols

title: Student Registration System Update
description: Upgrade online registration system for next semester enrollment

title: Alumni Network Event Planning
description: Organize annual alumni meetup and networking event

title: Laboratory Equipment Maintenance
description: Schedule and complete routine maintenance for all lab equipment
